text: is a former Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Kaneda was born on March 11, 1965. In June 1981, when she was 16 years old, she was selected the Japan national team for 1981 AFC Championship. At this competition, on June 7, she debuted against Chinese Taipei. This match is Japan team first match in "International A Match". She played in 2 matches at this championship. In September, she also played in 2 matches against England and Italy. However Japan was defeated by a score of 0â€“9 against Italy. This is the biggest defeat in the history of Japan national team. She played 4 games for Japan in 1981. ==Statistics== Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 1981 4 0 Total 4 0 ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese footballers Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:Shimizudaihachi Pleiades players Category:1981 AFC Women's Championship players
title: Shiho Kaneda
